servinfo.title: Engine Symptom Diagnosis
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the following table when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found Visual Inspection in and Engine Basic Check .

ps.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Refer to Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
Refer to Compression Check .
Refer to Valves and Valve Guides Inspection .
Refer to Valves and Valve Guides Inspection .
Refer to Valve Springs Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Compression leak at cylinder head gasket

action.ptxt: Refer to Cylinder Head Inspection .
Refer to Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection .
Refer to Piston Pins and Connecting Rods Inspection .
Refer to PCV Valve Inspection .
Refer to Spark Plug Inspection .
Refer to Ignition Coil Assembly (Igniter and Ignition Coil) Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe

action.ptxt: Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .
Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .

ps.ptxt: Air drawn in through intake manifold gasket or throttle body gasket

action.ptxt: Check air intake system.
Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

action.ptxt: Refer to Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection .
Refer to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .
Refer to condition of “Overheating”.
Refer to Spark Plug Inspection .
Refer to Ignition Coil Assembly (Igniter and Ignition Coil) Inspection .

ps.ptxt: – Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe

action.ptxt: Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .
Refer to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .
Refer to Fuel Injector Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Refer to Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
Refer to Compression Check .
Refer to condition: “Dragging brakes” in Brakes Symptom Diagnosis .
Refer to condition: “Slipping clutch” in Clutch (Hydraulic Type) Symptom Diagnosis .
Refer to DTC P0327 / P0328: Knock Sensor Circuit Low / High .

ps.ptxt: Air drawn in through intake manifold or throttle body gasket

action.ptxt: Check air intake system.
Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

action.ptxt: Refer to Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection .
Refer to IMT Vacuum Tank Assembly Inspection .

condition.ptxt: Improper engine idling or engine fails to idle

action.ptxt: Refer to Spark Plug Inspection .
Refer to Ignition Coil Assembly (Igniter and Ignition Coil) Inspection .
Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .
Refer to condition of “Overheating”.
Refer to Idle Speed and IAC Throttle Valve Opening Inspection .
Refer to EVAP Canister Purge Valve and Its Circuit Inspection .
Refer to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .
Refer to Fuel Injector Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Refer to or Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
Refer to Compression Check .
Refer to PCV Valve Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Leaky intake manifold, throttle body or cylinder head gasket

action.ptxt: Check air intake system.
Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

action.ptxt: Refer to Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Loose connection or disconnection of vacuum hoses

action.ptxt: Check connection or disconnection of vacuum hoses

ps.ptxt: Faulty electric load parts (headlight, blower motor and/or rear defogger)

action.ptxt: Refer to Electric Load Signal Circuit Check .

condition.ptxt: (Momentary lack of response as the accelerator is depressed. Can occur at all vehicle speeds. Usually most severe when first trying to make the vehicle move, as from a stop sign.)

ps.ptxt: Spark plug faulty or plug gap as out of adjustment

action.ptxt: Refer to Spark Plug Inspection .

ps.ptxt: – Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe

action.ptxt: Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .
Refer to condition of “Overheating”.
Refer to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .
Refer to Fuel Injector Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Refer to Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
Refer to Compression Check .
Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

action.ptxt: Refer to Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection .

condition.ptxt: (Engine power variation under steady throttle or cruise. Feels like the vehicle speeds up and down with no change in the accelerator pedal.)

ps.ptxt: Defective spark plug (excess carbon deposits, improper gap, and burned electrodes, etc.)

action.ptxt: Refer to Spark Plug Inspection .

ps.ptxt: – Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe

action.ptxt: Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .
Refer to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .
Refer to Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to Fuel Injector Inspection .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

action.ptxt: Refer to Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection .

condition.ptxt: (The engine makes sharp metallic knocks that change with throttle opening. Sounds like pop corn popping.)

action.ptxt: Refer to condition of “Overheating”.
Refer to Spark Plug Inspection .
Refer to Ignition Timing Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Clogged fuel filter and fuel lines

action.ptxt: Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .
Refer to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .

ps.ptxt: Faulty knock sensor, ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0327 / P0328: Knock Sensor Circuit Low / High , Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to Fuel Injector Inspection .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
Refer to Cylinder Head Inspection and Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection .

ps.ptxt: – Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe

action.ptxt: Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .

ps.ptxt: Air drawn in through intake manifold or throttle body gasket

action.ptxt: Check air intake system.
Refer to Thermostat Inspection .
Refer to Water Pump Inspection .
Refer to Radiator On-Vehicle Inspection and Cleaning .
Refer to Engine Oil and Filter Change .

ps.ptxt: Clogged oil filter or oil strainer

action.ptxt: Refer to Engine Oil and Filter Change or Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Cleaning .
Refer to Oil Pump Inspection .
Refer to condition: “Dragging brakes” in Brakes Symptom Diagnosis .
Refer to condition: “Slipping clutch” in Clutch (Hydraulic Type) Symptom Diagnosis .
Refer to Cylinder Head Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty radiator cooling fan control system

action.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0480 / P0481 / P0482: Fan 1 / Fan 2 / Fan 3 Control Circuit .
Release air from cooling system.

ps.ptxt: Faulty spark plug (improper gap, heavy deposits, and burned electrodes, etc.)

action.ptxt: Refer to Spark Plug Inspection .
Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .

ps.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Refer to Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .
Refer to Fuel Injector Inspection .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
Refer to Compression Check .
Refer to Valves and Valve Guides Inspection .
Refer to condition: “Dragging brakes” in Brakes Symptom Diagnosis .
Refer to condition: “Slipping clutch” in Clutch (Hydraulic Type) Symptom Diagnosis .
Refer to Thermostat Inspection .
Adjust tire pressure.
Refer to “Improper engine idling or engine fails to idle” under “Engine Symptom Diagnosis”.
Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

action.ptxt: Refer to Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection .
Refer to Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection .
Refer to Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Worn piston ring groove and ring

action.ptxt: Refer to Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Improper location of piston ring gap

action.ptxt: Refer to Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Disassembly and Reassembly .

ps.ptxt: Worn or damaged valve stem seal

action.ptxt: Replace.
Refer to Valves and Valve Guides Inspection .
Refer to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
Refer to Oil Pressure Switch Inspection .
Refer to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Cleaning .
Refer to Oil Pump Inspection .
Refer to Oil Pump Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Excessive clearance in various sliding parts

attention3.ptxt: Before checking the mechanical noise, make sure that:

action.ptxt: Refer to Valve Lash (Clearance) Inspection .
Refer to Valves and Valve Guides Inspection .
Refer to Valve Springs Inspection .
Refer to Valves and Valve Guides Inspection .
Refer to Camshafts, Tappets and Shims Removal and Installation .

ps.ptxt: Worn piston, ring and cylinder bore

action.ptxt: Refer to Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection .
Refer to Crank Pins and Connecting Rod Bearings Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Worn crank pin or connecting rod bearings

action.ptxt: Refer to Crank Pins and Connecting Rod Bearings Inspection .
Refer to Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Removal and Installation .
Refer to condition “Low oil pressure” previously described.
Refer to Main Bearings Inspection .
Refer to Crankshaft Inspection .
Refer to Main Bearings, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Removal and Installation .
Refer to Crankshaft Inspection .

condition.ptxt: Excessive hydrocarbon (HC) emission or carbon monoxide (CO)

ps.ptxt: Engine not at normal operating temperature

action.ptxt: Refer to Air Cleaner Filter Inspection and Cleaning .
Refer to Engine Vacuum Check .
Refer to Spark Plug Inspection .
Refer to Ignition Coil Assembly (Igniter and Ignition Coil) Inspection .
Refer to Compression Check .

ps.ptxt: Lead contamination of three way catalytic converter

action.ptxt: Check for absence of filler neck restrictor.
Refer to EVAP Canister Purge Valve and Its Circuit Inspection .

ps.ptxt: – Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe

action.ptxt: Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .

ps.ptxt: Closed loop system (A/F feedback compensation) fails (faulty TP sensor, poor performance of ECT sensor or MAF sensor)

action.ptxt: Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection , Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

action.ptxt: Refer to Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection .
Refer to Fuel Injector Circuit Check .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
Refer to Ignition Timing Inspection .
Check for absence of filler neck restrictor.
Refer to EGR System Inspection (If Equipped) .

ps.ptxt: – Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe

action.ptxt: Refer to Fuel Pressure Check .

ps.ptxt: Closed loop system (A/F feedback compensation) fails (faulty TP sensor, poor performance of ECT sensor or MAF sensor)

action.ptxt: Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection , Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Refer to Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

action.ptxt: Refer to Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection .
Refer to Fuel Injector Circuit Check .
Refer to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .
